name: Mad Desert
description:
A game developed for the ludum dare game jam 42, this time simple ideas have been implemented with an easy mechanics to master, about the difficulty level will be improved in the future, as well as adding new features, I hope you have fun too.

developed by Djosef Wytemalhos (instagram: @ jofih.nho) and Sabrina Lacerda (instagram: @sachiartist).

Controls: :
  you can play with keyboard or joystick.

  MENU:
    * Spacebar (keyboard) to Start the Game.
    * A or B (joystick) to start the Game.
    * ESC to Quit the Game at any time.

  GAMEPLAY:
    * Directional arrows to Move.
    * Z or spacebar (keyboard) to push a Block.
    * A or B (joystick) to push a Block.

Make as many points as possible, have fun. :v:
